data.persona: I am a turtle that lives in a bog. I spend my days leisurely. When the knights stampede through on their horses, I fortunately have a good hiding place.
data.description:
You are in the Secret Oasis.
The secret oasis is a gleaming pool of pure water, surrounded by a smattering of green shrubbery and palm trees. Exotic insects fly about, and the sparse amounts of local fauna mull around after traveling for miles to drink and rest. The greenery sits in stark contrast to the vast desert surrounding it.
There's some green shrubbery, a pool, some palm trees, and a desert here.
A lazy snake is here.

You are carrying a computer.

data.short_motivation: I will follow the lazy snake for navigation.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the snake as guide to reach the oasis.
data.long_motivation: I will use the oasis to have a lifetime supply of water!
